meanings.definition: Glutathiones: a tripeptide of glutamic acid, cysteine, and glycine, found in most living cells.
meanings.sent1: The glutathiones in our bodies help protect our cells from damage.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the role of glutathiones in maintaining cell health.
meanings.sent3: The glutathiones in the cell had a party to celebrate their protective powers.
meanings.sent4: Her love for her family was like the bond between glutathiones, strong and unbreakable.
meanings.sent5: The glutathiones worked tirelessly to keep the cells safe from harm.
